qas.question: What is the second most often spoken language is Catalonia?
What is the most used language in Catalonia?
What is the type designation of Catalan in Catalonia?
What group spends money to promote the language?
What language is promoted in Catalonia?

context: According to the Statistical Institute of Catalonia in 2008 the <a0_0><a4_0>Catalan<a4_0/><a0_0/> language is the second most commonly used in Catalonia, after <a1_0>Spanish<a1_0/>, as a <a2_0>native<a2_0/> or self-defining language. <a3_0>The Generalitat of Catalunya<a3_0/> spends part of its annual budget on the promotion of the use of Catalan in Catalonia and in other territories.
